item.title: Rocket Lab’s Big Rebound? Analysts Suggest the Dip's a Gift
item.description: Analyst sentiment remains strong, with consensus price targets rising steadily to a record $58.17 despite RKLB’s sharp recent pullback.

item.title: Meta’s AI Moment? New SAM 3 Model Has Wall Street Turning Bullish
item.description: Meta Platforms just released a computer vision AI model with state-of-the-art capabilities. Soon after, the stock received a $900 price target.

item.title: Snowflake Stock: The Dip That Smart Investors Are Buying Right Now
item.description: Snowflake is on track for big gains in 2026 as the adoption of cloud and AI services accelerates globally. Analysts point to a 30% upside.

item.title: Kraken Robotics Stock Exploded 1,000%—Now Wall Street Is Paying Attention
item.description: Kraken Robotics' stock price was unleashed in 2023 and is still gaining momentum, on track to set a record high in early 2026.

item.title: Kroger Stock Analysis: Digital Pivot, Dividend Safety & 2026 Growth Plan
item.description: Kroger's December stock price pullback presents an entry point for long-term investors seeking sustainable, profitable growth and capital returns.
